## Learning Outcomes

::: {.callout-important title="Principal Learning Outcome 3"}
Understand and describe the functional anatomy of the digestive system for carbohydrates, lipids and proteins.
:::

After this lecture, you should be able to:
--  Understand and describe the functional anatomy and histology of the digestive system.
--  Understand the regulation of the digestive system
including hormones of the gastrointestinal tract.
--  Describe digestion and absorption of carbohydrates, proteins and lipids
including the role of the gut microbiome
